description:
Help your little one become one with nature in this camouflage bucket hat. At UPF 50+, this hat helps keep little noggins sun safe.

  • Cotton is super comfy and “hand-me-down” durable
  • Breakaway chinstrap keeps the hat right where it should be when the wind kicks up
  • UPF 50+ stops more than 98% of harsh UV in its tracks
name: Headster Camo Bucket Hat - Children
